title: Abandoned Farm House, Mapleton, Minnesota
marks: Signature, Title and Date on back at bottom edge, in pencil: [ABANDONED FARM
description: old room with gabled ceiling; cracked and peeling walls and ceiling, with debris on floor at right and left; door at center slightly ajar, with a view of a farm field through window in door
creditline: Gift of Will Agar and Mary Stoyke
